entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Argentia 3:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few flurries or rain showers changing to periods of rain near midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the morning. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
